channel.title: CVE Feed for F-Secure -- F-Secure Mobile Security
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F-Secure -- F-Secure Mobile Security

item.title: CVE-2021-40834|2024-08-04T02:51:07.506Z -- f-secure -- f-secure%20mobile%20security
item.description: A user interface overlay vulnerability was discovered in F-secure SAFE Browser for Android. When user click on a specially crafted seemingly legitimate URL SAFE browser goes into full screen and hides the user interface. A remote attacker can leverage this to perform spoofing attack.

item.title: CVE-2021-40835|2024-08-04T02:51:07.421Z -- f-secure -- f-secure%20mobile%20security
item.description: An URL Address bar spoofing vulnerability was discovered in Safe Browser for iOS. When user clicks on a specially crafted a malicious URL, if user does not carefully pay attention to url, user may be tricked to think content may be coming from a valid domain, while it comes from another. This is performed by using a very long username part of the url so that user cannot see the domain name. A remote attacker can leverage this to perform url address bar spoofing attack. The fix is, browser no longer shows the user name part in address bar.
